main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Hillcrest Heights, Maryland on September 8, 1954.
interesting points: The observer described the object as circular with light beams radiating from it., The object hovered low in the sky with an estimated speed of less than 5 mph., The sighting lasted for 2 minutes., The observer was a major with 15 years of flying experience., The witness was certain that the object could not have been an aircraft.
witness description: Major, rated pilot with 15 years of experience
